p: After transesterification reaction, for each 100 (±0.05) mg of mixture oligoester catalyst and glycerol, an amount of 2.0 (±0.1) g of silica was used to fill the purification column (2 cm diameter). Ethanol (PA) was used as an eluent phase (15 mL). A mixture of catalyst and glycerol was separated at atmospheric pressure and room temperature. The material remaining in the eluent was dried (60 °C until constant weight) and acidulated with hydrochloric acid 0.1 mol·L−1 solution, washed with water until neutral pH, and once more dried until constant weight.
